person.persName: Samuel G. Henry (Louisville, Kentucky, auctioneer and merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, auctioneer and merchant. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary Henry. Father of Noah Henry, John B. Henry, Dudley Henry, Hite Bowman Henry, and Lewis Henry. Auctioneer in Louisville in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Auctioneer and commission merchant in S. G. Henry & Company in Louisville from 1851 to 1860. Hired three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Auctioneer and commission merchant in partnership with Hite B. Henry in S.G. Henry & Company in Louisville in 1861 through 1865.
